title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 367.10 - Vending machines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 367.10 - Vending machines

State Regulations
(a) For the
purposes of this Part, the dealer for any vending machine containing beverages
in beverage containers is the person who fills or refills the vending
machine. (b) The dealer for any
such vending machine must post a conspicuous notice on the vending machine
which states the dealer's name, business address and the normal business hours
during which the dealer will redeem empty beverage containers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
367.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
